does anyone else get a lot of GREEN on these rips - particularly on people's faces? I've been noticing it more and more - but only in the YIFY rips...
Hi YIFY, i have been wondering what software you use and your settings for your insanely amazing compression. I have been looking for like a week. Please respond :)
dude you can try using handbrake gives decent results

quality is not of YIFY standard the picture is too grainy.

A 8
V 7
here in d phil.. we luv yah YIFY! ur d man..great uploads

@maniaq77:
If you are using MPC, go to options - playback - output. If EVR is selected, it is the cause of those "green". Select VMR-9, or use VLC to play MP4 files.
